* Prefer subterfuge? Rogues and ninjas bypass the thick of the fighting and go straight after the enemy’s infrastructure.
* Learn from the computer AI by seeing its strategy play out in real-time. Improve your tactics, obtain victory, and reclaim the throne in the Final Battle!

Different game modes:

* Take back the kingdom in the classic Campaign game mode against the AI or challenge your friends in competitive one-on-one battles.
* Tailor multiplayer fights to your desires with the settings and wage battle from skirmish to all-out war.
* Two difficulty modes: Easy for a more casual experience and Normal to play how it was intended.

So, King, do you think you have what it takes to restore your kingdom, dispose of these traitors, and make your mark on destiny?

70030000008521.name: Dragon Quest® XI S: Echoes of an Elusive Age - Definitive Edition Demo

70030000009021.name: The Tenth Line Special Edition DEMO

70030000009041.name: Ori and the Blind Forest: Definitive Edition Demo

70050000004102.name: Costume Set "Japanese New Year"
70050000004102.description:
Give Eren, Mikasa, Levi and Armin new outfits.

This product is included in the below set.  Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
-Additional Costumes 16 Piece Set

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by either of the following:
1. Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select the character.
Change into the new costume by pressing the B button when you are near the tent on the field.
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach the character in the Daily Life section.
Change into the new costume by pressing the A button when you are near the character.

70050000004103.name: Costume Set "Summer Festival"
70050000004103.description:
Give Eren, Levi and Armin new outfits.
*Please note that Mikasa's Outfit is not included.

This product is included in the below set.  Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
-Additional Costumes 16 Piece Set
 *Mikasa's Summer Festival Outfit is also included in the set.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by either of the following:
1. Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select the character.
Change into the new costume by pressing the B button when you are near the tent on the field.
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach the character in the Daily Life section.
Change into the new costume by pressing the A button when you are near the character.

70050000004104.name: Costume Set "Halloween"
70050000004104.description:
Give Eren, Mikasa, Levi and Armin new outfits.

-Additional Costumes 16 Piece Set

▼How to use

2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach the character in the Daily Life section.

70050000004143.name: Costume Set "Christmas"
70050000004143.description:

This product is included in the below set.  Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
-Additional Costumes 16 Piece Set

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by either of the following:

Change into the new costume by pressing the B button when you are near the tent on the field.
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach the character in the Daily Life section.
Change into the new costume by pressing the A button when you are near the character.

70050000004147.name: Mikasa Costume "Summer Festival"
70050000004147.description:
Give Mikasa  a new outfit.
Add a little flavor to the battlefield by wearing a costume with a Summer motif.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by either of the following:
1. Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select the character.
Change into the new costume by pressing the B button when you are near the tent on the field.
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach the character in the Daily Life section.
Change into the new costume by pressing the A button when you are near the character.

70050000004241.name: Bonus Octo-themed Gear
70050000004241.description: When you purchase Splatoon 2: Octo Expansion, whether in advance or after launch, you’ll receive immediate access to special octo-themed in-game gear (Studio Octophones & Octo Layered LS).

70050000004242.name: Splatoon 2: Octo Expansion
70050000004242.description: Play as an Octoling for the very first time in this large-scale downloadable content for the Splatoon 2 game! This full-on single-player adventure spans 80 missions starring Agent 8, a new character who awakens without her memories on a dark subway platform. Navigate this mysterious underground test facility in a desperate battle to reach the surface of Inkopolis. Escape from these twisted depths, and you’ll finally be able to join multiplayer* matches as an Octoling! You may think you know everything about the world of Splatoon, but these waters run deep, and so does the lore.

70050000004387.name: Additional Episode: "Discouragement and the Leaning Tower"

70050000004390.name: Additional Episode: "A Titan Worth a Thousand"

70050000008228.name: Splatoon™ 2  - Nintendo Switch Online Special Gear
70050000008228.description:
As a special offer, Nintendo Account holders with 12-month Nintendo Switch Online memberships (individual or family) will get download codes for exclusive in-game gear for your character to wear in the Splatoon 2 game.

This gear includes two items:
・Online Jersey
・Online Squidkid V Shoes

70050000008501.name: Piranha Plant
70050000008501.description:
Piranha Plant from the Super Mario series is now available as fighter DLC!
You don't need to purchase this if you received a download code as a bonus for purchasing the game early. Make sure you aren't paying for something you already have!

Note: Piranha Plant is not included in the Fighters Pass (sold separately).

70050000008502.name: Joker Challenger Pack
70050000008502.description:
Joker, the leader of the Phantom Thieves of Hearts from Persona 5, joins the battle! Turn your rebellious spirit into strength, and fight gracefully alongside the great Arsene! Joker is paired with a new stage named Mementos. With his bold style and surprising speed, Joker will take your heart!

This set contains the following:
・ Fighter: Joker
・ Stage: Mementos
・ Music: 11 tracks (*1)
・ Smash tag icons: 3
・ Spirits: Joker (Phantom Thief), Joker (Student) (*2)
・ Spirit Board additions: Spirits from the Persona series that were added in Ver. 3.0.0. (*3) (*4)

*1 Can be found in Vault → Sounds.
*2 Collectable via Classic Mode or the Shop on the Vault menu after purchasing this set.
*3 Check the "Software update available: Ver. 3.0.0" news update for details on the new spirits.
*4 You can get the new Persona spirits (excluding the Joker spirits) from Vault → Shop even without purchasing this set.

70050000008503.name: Hero Challenger Pack
70050000008503.description:
The Hero from DRAGON QUEST XI S has arrived! You can attack with all kinds of spells and techniques by selecting them from a command window, just like in the DRAGON QUEST series. Past heroes from DRAGON QUEST III, IV and VIII are also available, and the stage for this set is Yggdrasil's Altar. You can also enjoy the field and battle music from each featured game!

*This DLC is included in the Fighters Pass (sold separately). If you've purchased the Fighters Pass, you don't need to purchase this set.

This downloadable content set contains the following:
・ Fighter: Hero
・ Stage: Yggdrasil's Altar
・ Music: 8 tracks (*1)
・ Smash tag icons: 5
・ Spirits: Hero (DRAGON QUEST XI S), Hero (DRAGON QUEST III), Hero (DRAGON QUEST IV), Hero (DRAGON QUEST VIII) (*2)
・ Spirit Board additions: Spirits from the DRAGON QUEST series that were added in Ver. 4.0.0. (*3) (*4)

*1 Can be found in Vault → Sounds.
*2 Collectable via Classic Mode or the Shop on the Vault menu after purchasing this set.
*3 You can get the new DRAGON QUEST spirits (excluding the Hero spirits) from Vault → Shop even without purchasing this set.
*4 Check the ""Software update available: Ver. 4.0.0"" news update for details on the new spirits.

70050000008504.name: Banjo & Kazooie Challenger Pack
70050000008504.description:
The titular unlikely duo from the Banjo-Kazooie series is going strong in the world of Smash! The pack includes the stage Spiral Mountain, which, as the name suggests, rotates during battle! Finally, there's a song arrangement created by Grant Kirkhope himself!

*This DLC is included in the Fighters Pass (sold separately). If you've purchased the Fighters Pass, you don't need to purchase this set.

This downloadable content set contains the following:

・ Fighter: Banjo & Kazooie
・ Stage: Spiral Mountain
・ Music: 10 tracks (*1)
・ Smash tag icons: 3
・ Spirits: Banjo & Kazooie (*2)
・ Spirit Board additions: Spirits from the Banjo-Kazooie series that were added in Ver. 5.0.0. (*3) (*4)

*1 Can be found in Vault → Sounds.
*2 Collectable via Classic Mode or the Shop on the Vault menu after purchasing this set.
*3 You can get these new spirits from Vault → Shop even without purchasing this set.
*4 Check the "Software update available: Ver. 5.0.0" news update on the Nintendo website for details on the new spirits.

70050000008505.name: Challenger Pack 4
70050000008505.description:
Planned for distribution by 29/02/2020
The fourth set will be the Terry Bogard Challenger Pack.
This downloadable content set contains the following:
　・Fighter: Terry Bogard
　・One new stage
　・Multiple new music tracks

Note: Further details will be announced periodically.

70050000008506.name: Challenger Pack 5
70050000008506.description:
Planned for distribution by 29.02.2020
This downloadable content set contains the following:
　・1 new fighter
　・1 new stage
　・Several new music tracks

Note: Further details will be announced periodically.

70050000008507.name:
Rex: Xenoblade Chronicles 2
Mii Fighter Costume
70050000008507.description:
Available 07/12/2018
This costume of Rex from Xenoblade Chronicles 2 is an exclusive bonus for purchasing the Fighter Pass. The set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Rex Wig
・ Rex Outfit (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter

70050000008508.name: Persona 3 Protagonist Wig + Outfit
70050000008508.description:
A Mii Fighter costume based on the protagonist of Persona 3 is now available. The outfit part is for Mii Swordfighters, and naturally includes a replica of the Gekkoukan High School uniform. It even has minor details like the protagonist's headphones. Wear this to prepare for the Dark Hour!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Persona 3 Protagonist Wig
・ Persona 3 Protagonist Outfit (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter

70050000008509.name: Persona 4 Protagonist Wig + Outfit
70050000008509.description:
A Mii Fighter costume based on the protagonist of Persona 4 is now available. The outfit part is for Mii Swordfighters, and it perfectly recreates Yasogami High School's uniform. Wear this and you're pretty much the leader of the Investigation Team! Maybe you'll get the urge to visit the food court at Junes!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Persona 4 Protagonist Wig
・ Persona 4 Protagonist Outfit (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000008510.name: Teddie Hat
70050000008510.description:
A Mii Fighter hat based on Teddie from Persona 4 is now available for purchase! Teddie gets to keep the un-bear-ably cute body, but you can pretend you're him with the hat. Sensei won’t fall for it, but you might fool Yosuke!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Teddie Hat

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter

70050000008511.name: Morgana Hat
70050000008511.description:
A Mii Fighter hat based on Morgana from Persona 5 is now available for purchase! The cat-like ears may be cute, but Morgana is NOT a cat! Wear this and you'll feel like one of the Phantom Thieves!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Morgana Hat

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter

70050000011187.name: Tails Hat + Outfit
70050000011187.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Tails from the Sonic The Hedgehog series is now available. The outfit part is for Mii Gunners only, which is perfect for a mechanical genius like Tails. The pop-gun may look like a toy, but it unleashes incredible power! Wear this costume and battle your friend Sonic!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Tails Hat
・ Tails Outfit (for Gunners)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter

70050000011188.name: Knuckles Hat + Outfit
70050000011188.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Knuckles from the Sonic The Hedgehog series is now available. The outfit part is for a Mii Brawler only - perfect for the no-nonsense echidna. Unleash explosive rock-breaking punches to KO your foes! Bring it on!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Knuckles Hat
・ Knuckles Outfit (for Brawlers)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter

70050000011861.name: A.O.T. 2: Final Battle Upgrade Pack
70050000011861.description:
"A.O.T. 2: Final Battle Upgrade Pack" contains the latest content for the tactical hunting action series based on the hit anime series "Attack on Titan."

■Includes the stories from seasons 1~3 of the anime!
Includes the latest stories, which are planned to be aired starting in April of 2019 (in Japan).
With situations taken from the original manga, experience the story from the same point of view as the other characters.

■Playable characters have been added!
Characters that played a major role in the 3rd season such as Kenny, Zeke, Nifa, Floch, and Caven join the battle!

■The new equipment "Thunder Spear" has been added!
Thunder Spears are powerful weapons that can be used to get you out of even the direst situations.
They are particularly effective against enemies that are tough to cut with a blade, such as the Armored Titan!

■The new equipment "Anti-personnel Omni-directional Mobility Gear" has been added!
While maintaining the thrill of omni-directional mobility from previous titles, you can enjoy all new action by shooting the enemy rather than using blades.
In addition to battling the Titans, human versus human battles also unfold!

■The new mode "Territory Recovery Mode" has been added!
A mode in which you invite your favorite characters from the original story to join your regiment, and aim to reclaim the territory beyond the walls.
You can freely set teams with combinations of characters that would be unheard of in the original story!
Increase the camaraderie among characters, and enjoy conversation events that can only be experienced in the game.

70050000012102.name: Erdrick's Helmet + Armour
70050000012102.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Erdrick from the DRAGON QUEST series is now available for purchase. The outfit part is for Mii Swordfighters only. The brilliant blue with gold trim and Erdrick's emblem just scream DRAGON QUEST and are sure to make you stand out! You might even feel like a legendary hero...

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Erdrick's Helmet
・ Erdrick's Armour (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000012103.name: Martial Artist Wig + Gi
70050000012103.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of the Martial Artist vocation from the DRAGON QUEST series is now available for purchase. The outfit part is for Mii Brawlers only, but both the outfit and wig change depending on whether your Mii is male or female! What if you wore this in a team battle with the Hero?

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Martial Artist Wig
・ Martial Artist Gi (for Brawlers)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000012104.name: Veronica's Hat + Outfit
70050000012104.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Veronica from DRAGON QUEST XI S is now available for purchase. You can don the red cap and cute braids of the most powerful mage! ...Except that the outfit part is for Swordfighters. But that's fine, you can still mix it up in Smash with Veronica's favourite staff!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Veronica's Hat
・ Veronica's Outfit (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000012105.name: Slime Hat
70050000012105.description:
The Slime Hat, based on the creature from the DRAGON QUEST series, is now available for purchase. This isn't one of those bad slimes - its lovable, wobbly face is sure to make a big impression! Boing! Wear this to finally know what it's like to be a slime.

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Slime Hat

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000012119.name: Dead by Daylight - The Saw® Chapter
70050000012119.description: Life is the most precious thing we have. A gift we are given, but a gift some squander. We need to be alive and not just exist. This is where The Pig steps in - a teacher that provides those selected with an opportunity to appreciate life yet again. To fight for our own survival, or simply let go and die. David Tapp thinks otherwise. He believes that everyone is free to live their own life, without the threat of death in the shape of a trap. A seasoned detective that seeks The Pig - a search that brings him to the Gideon Meat Plant.

70050000012152.name: Dead by Daylight: Ash vs Evil Dead
70050000012152.description:
Ash Williams, the legendary hero from the Ash vs Evil Dead horror series, has entered the realm of the Entity. While this time the chainsaw is not his to wield, Ash knows how to escape gruesome death. Wander through The Fog as Ash and escape evil once more.

During a weekend at a cabin, Ash uncovered the Necronomicon Ex-Mortis (Book of the Dead) and awoke something dark in the woods. Evil possessed his friends, whom he was forced to kill, and his right hand, which he sawed off. For the next thirty years, Ash ran from his past, working at a Value Stop department store and seducing women in dive bars. But he screwed up one night when he read from the Necronomicon to impress a woman. Evil found him once more. After a terrible fight, Ash, drawing his last breath, was taken by the Knights of Sumeria and transported into the future. But after his deal with a demon went South, Ash found himself in the realm of the Entity, without shotgun or chainsaw.

70050000012153.name: Dead by Daylight: DARKNESS AMONG US Chapter
70050000012153.description:
Darkness Among Us is a brand-new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a new Killer, a Survivor, a Map and an exclusive item for the new survivor.   

The everyday contains many hazards. But the comforts of routine shroud the unfathomable risks of a threat so intimate, so familiar, that it can only be seen in hindsight. A disturbing, violent force could be raging within the people closest to you. Darkness is among us, every day.

The raw cravings and impulses of adolescence are powerful.When three teens get involved with an impulsive mastermind, they discover an addictive kind of freedom. Together, they spiral out of control and become the wrong kind of crowd, The Legion, which leaves no rule unbroken. 

Jeff Johansen was invited to take a trip down memory lane when his past caught up with him. He returned to his hometown, ready to face everything he was forced to leave behind. It’s never too late to be in the wrong place at the wrong time.

70050000012154.name: Dead by Daylight: DEMISE OF THE FAITHFUL Chapter
70050000012154.description:
The DEMISE OF THE FAITHFUL is a Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a new Killer, a Survivor, a Map, and an exclusive item for the new Survivor.

Surrender yourself to the vast inexplicable: that is the oath of the faithful. In darkness, they look inward for a beacon of light. But when their light is distorted by pride and ambition, how long will they err in the dark? 
 
The Plague found solace in sacred rituals, a way to repel the darkness she carried inside. As a High Priestess of Babylon, she believed she was invulnerable. When a sickness began to defile her body, she confronted her gods, realizing too late they were not the ones answering her prayers. 
 
Jane Romero was striving to become a TV host, an inspiring voice for those in need. Every day she would share her beliefs and practices with thousands of followers. One evening, driving home after a particularly stressful live show, she closed her eyes for a moment… and never made it home.

70050000012156.name: Dead by Daylight: HALLOWEEN® Chapter
70050000012156.description:
HALLOWEEN® is a Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a new Killer, a Survivor, a Map, and an exclusive item for the new Survivor.

To most the town of Haddonfield felt safe, a place where most went to sleep with unlocked doors. All that changed one dark Halloween when the white mask that stalks the night returned home to find his next victims. Witness the purest form of evil. Where pain is the beginning and death is the end. You’ll get to encounter Michael Myers himself. Together with Laurie Strode, you’ll either fight for survival or slaughter in their old hometown, Haddonfield.

70050000012507.name: Additional costume for Christa "Queen Historia" Costume
70050000012507.description:
A new costume for Christa is added.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by performing either of the following:
・Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select Christa. Change into the costume "Queen Historia" by pressing the A Button when you are near the tent on the field.
・Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach Christa in the Daily Life section, or approach her at the regimental base in "Territory Recovery Mode". Change into the costume "Queen Historia" by pressing the B Button when you are near Christa.

70050000012508.name: Additional costume for Kenny "Coat (Young Male)" Costume
70050000012508.description:
A new costume for Kenny is added.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by performing either of the following:
・Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select Kenny. Change into the costume "Coat (Young Male)" by pressing the A Button when you are near the tent on the field.
・Select "Territory Recovery Mode" on the main menu, and then approach Kenny at the regimental base. Change into the costume "Coat (Young Male)" by pressing the B Button when you are near Kenny.

70050000012509.name: Additional costume for Mikasa "One-piece Dress" Costume
70050000012509.description:
A new costume for Mikasa is added.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by performing either of the following:
・Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select Mikasa. Change into the costume "One-piece Dress" by pressing the A Button when you are near the tent on the field.
・Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach Mikasa in the Daily Life section, or approach her at the regimental base in "Territory Recovery Mode". Change into the costume "One-piece Dress" by pressing the B Button when you are near Mikasa.

70050000012512.name: Additional costume for Levi "Plain Clothes (Underground City)" Costume
70050000012512.description:
A new costume for Levi is added.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by performing either of the following:
・Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select Levi. Change into the costume "Plain Clothes (Underground City)" by pressing the A Button when you are near the tent on the field.
・Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach Levi in the Daily Life section, or approach him at the regimental base in "Territory Recovery Mode". Change into the costume "Plain Clothes (Underground City)" by pressing the B Button when you are near Levi.

70050000012609.name: Into the Dead 2: George A. Romero’s Night of the Living Dead Add On
70050000012609.intro: Fight for Survival in the Iconic Cinematic Universe
70050000012609.description: Follow the story of Ben and his grueling encounters prior to the events of the iconic film. Experience the unexplained events of the zombie uprising as you team up with country girl Alice in a fight for survival across 12 levels.

70050000012610.name: Into the Dead 2: Ghostbusters Add On
70050000012610.intro: Join the Ghostbusters in an all new action adventure battling specters, spooks, and demons to save the city!
70050000012610.description: Strap on your Proton Pack and join Egon, Winston, Peter, and Ray as a new rookie Ghostbuster recruited to investigate a paranormal disturbance. Bring Slimer along to add an extra otherworldly boost!

70050000012615.name: Dead by Daylight: CHARITY CASE
70050000012615.description: You’ve watched your favorite broadcasters play Dead by Daylight and show off their exclusive outfits, now you can finally get your hands on those amazing threads and proudly display your fandom! On top of that, 100% of Behaviour Digital's proceeds from the sale of this item will go to the Brain & Behavior Research Foundation. The Charity Case is a collection of 26 cosmetic items for many of the Dead by Daylight survivors and killers. It contains 20 brand new customization options based on your favorite broadcasters and 6 previously exclusive items from old friends.

70050000012616.name: Dead by Daylight: STRANGER THINGS Chapter
70050000012616.description:
STRANGER THINGS is a brand-new Chapter for Dead by Daylight that features a new Killer and two new Survivors. The Entity descends upon the midwestern town of Hawkins, Indiana as Stranger Things, the critically acclaimed Netflix Original Series, enters the realm of Dead by Daylight.  

The Stranger Things Chapter includes a new map, the Underground Complex, located below the Hawkins National Laboratory. A Demogorgon is the new untamable Killer. Against the Demogorgon stands not one, but two new Survivors: Nancy Wheeler, a tough aspiring journalist, and Steve Harrington, a former high school jock with a knack for finding trouble. The Stranger Things Chapter also features two exclusive cosmetic items: Steve’s Scuffed Rolled Sleeves and Nancy’s Torn Sweatshirt.

70050000012670.name: FIA European Truck Racing Championship Indianapolis Motor Speedway Track
70050000012670.description: The most prestigious track in the United States ever since it was built in 1909, the Indianapolis Motor Speedway is the second oldest purpose-built motor racing circuit in the world. Its capacity, with room for over 400,000 spectators, makes it an ideal setting for legendary motorsport battles. In ETRC, Indianapolis is the ideal track for showing off the power of trucks.

70050000012844.name: Dead by Daylight: Ghost Face®
70050000012844.description:
Ghost Face® is joining Dead by Daylight. Lurking in the shroud of night, he is a natural stalker who observes his victims before striking. The Ghost Face DLC includes two exclusive items for The Ghost Face: the body Monochrome Maniac and weapon Silvery Steel Tactical Knife. These items are only available as part of the DLC.

Acquaintances are a dangerous deception. The workplace is filled with them; strangers seated beside us, five days a week. A distant familiarity grown from habit; the blanks filled with assumptions as we forget how little we know, until proven otherwise. No one thought the man seated on their left could be responsible for the murder of a dozen people. Until proven otherwise.

The Ghost Face took full advantage of that fact, blending in the everyday. He would have gotten away with it as he had before: he would have packed his bags when the investigation pointed in his direction, driven a few miles, and looked for another job. 

But this time he found a richer hunting ground…

70050000012922.name: Yooka-Laylee and the Impossible Lair - Trowzer's Top Tonic Pack
70050000012922.intro: With this pack of top tonics, players will have even more choice when customising the way they play!
70050000012922.description:
Treat yourself to "Trowzer's Top Tonic Pack" and play with even more tonics!

Largee Head! This tonic gives Laylee a comically oversized head. No cheat code required.

Glow Worm! Yooka and Laylee aren't worms but hey, look at them glow! 

D.I.S.C.O! Turn every level into a platforming party of Playtonic proportions.

Yooka 64! For fans of all things retro this tonic will be a blast from the past! No added polygons.

70050000013061.name: Arcade Pack
70050000013061.description:
Purchase this bundle and get the following content :
・Joystick Bat
・Character Styles

70050000013108.name: Asphalt 9: Legends Starting Racer Pack
70050000013108.description:
Get a head start with the Asphalt 9: Legends Starting Racer Pack! Unlock incredible supercars and resources to boost your progress, and challenge your friends and family in split-screen multiplayer right from the beginning.
This pack contains:
• 20 Blueprints to unlock the BMW 3.0 CSL Hommage 
• 20 Blueprints to unlock the DS Automobiles DS E-Tense 
• 20 Blueprints to unlock the Lotus Evora Sport 410 
• 20 Blueprints to unlock the Dodge Challenger 392 HEMI Scat Pack
• 25 Blueprints to unlock the Porsche 911 Carrera GTS 
• 200,000 Credits
• 300 Tokens

70050000013172.name: Investigator Pack
70050000013172.description: Upgrade your gaming experience with an exclusive private investigator outfit, permanent access to a first aid kit, antipsychotics and a crafting materials starter pack.

70050000013284.name: Toby's Dream
70050000013284.intro: Experience Toby's Dream, a special bonus level for Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince.
70050000013284.description:
Toby the dog, as previously seen in Nine Parchments, has his own adventure in Heatherwood Hall with the Three Heroes! Follow the pawsteps of Toby and help him find all the treats hidden in the castle and its gardens.
 
To access Toby's Dream, complete the Prince's Dream level of Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince and locate Toby's Dream in the level selection map.

70050000013344.name: CONTRA: ROGUE CORPS - BONUS T-SHIRTS
70050000013344.description:
CONTRA is back! Two years after the Alien Wars ended, the Damned City erupts from the final battleground. From the midst of the chaos, a group of scoundrels emerge.

They might not be typical heroes, but they're here to save the world… or get rich trying.

Bonus T-Shirt skins for Hungry Beast. 
One featuring the iconic duo Bill and Lance, the other featuring the classic Contra logo.

70050000013345.name: CONTRA: ROGUE CORPS Hungry Beast 4 T-shirts pack
70050000013345.intro: Pack of 4 T-Shirt skins for Hungry Beast.
70050000013345.description:
Includes: 
Rogue Corps logo design
Konami Code design
Alien Wars design
Lily's Hungry Beast T-Shirt

70050000013360.name: Merciful Madness
70050000013360.description:
Dive deeper into madness with three brand new side quests exclusive to the Nintendo Switch™!

The quests explore Lovecraft’s iconic stories and bring to light the mysteries of Oakmont and its demented citizens.

70050000013361.name: Chicago Organ Grinder
70050000013361.description:
Style or power? Now you can have both with the Chicago Organ Grinder, the favourite weapon of 1920s gangsters.
This DLC includes a skin for your Tommy gun.

70050000013362.name: Worshippers of the Necronomicon
70050000013362.description: Keep the adventure going with this pack of 3 brand-new quests in which Charles Reed investigates unsolved cases and sets out in search of mysterious spell books that harbour unspeakable powers.

70050000013363.name: Experience Boost
70050000013363.description: This DLC includes a skill point that can be used from the start of the game. Use it wisely to upgrade your combat skills, vigor or mind.

70050000013401.name: Experience x3 - Illusion of L'Phalcia
70050000013401.description:
All characters' experience gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000013404.name: SP x3 - Illusion of L'Phalcia
70050000013404.description:
All characters' SP gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000013406.name: Experience & SP x2 - Illusion of L'Phalcia
70050000013406.description:
All characters' experience and SP gained increases by 100%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000013444.name: CONTRA: ROGUE CORPS - Retro Bill Pack
70050000013444.description:
Retro Bill skin for Kaiser. 

Plus, bonus T-Shirt skin for Gentleman and in-game items.

70050000013456.name: DAEMON X MACHINA Digital Bonus
70050000013456.description:
Free bonus if you buy DAEMON X MACHINA on Nintendo eShop:

Prototype Arsenal*
Prototype Plugsuit*
Metallic Plugsuit
ZAW-S08C Habakiri
HAW-R01C Grim Reaper
SAW-B17C Gillingr Impact
HAW-M01C Silver Raven
SAW-AM02C Thunderbird

*This downloadable content will also be available for purchase at a later date

70050000013571.name: CONTRA: ROGUE CORPS - The Gentleman Beetle Pack
70050000013571.description:
Beetle skin for Gentleman. 

Plus, bonus T-Shirt skin for Ms. Harakiri and in-game items.

70050000013572.name: CONTRA: ROGUE CORPS - Assassin Pack
70050000013572.description:
Sister .H skin for Ms. Harakiri. 

Plus, bonus T-Shirt for Kaiser and in-game items.

70050000013655.name: WRC 8 - Alpine A110 (1973)
70050000013655.description: The Alpine A110 is none other than the first car to win the World Rally Championship in the modern era. Many top drivers were successful in the 1970s at the wheel of this Berlinette. Agile and responsive, the Alpine A110 has incredible traction and is particularly adept at negotiating bends.

70050000013656.name: WRC 8 - Ford Escort MkII 1800 (1979)
70050000013656.description: Ford is still active in the WRC as an official manufacturer, but it had already made history with its Ford Escort RS1800. Sporting a 270hp Cosworth engine, it helped the Detroit manufacturer win its first manufacturers title in 1979. Two years later, Ari Vatanen won the drivers championship with the Escort RS1800.

70050000013657.name: WRC 8 - Lancia Delta HF Integrale Evoluzione (1992)
70050000013657.description: The Lancia Delta is the ultimate rally car! With 11 manufacturers titles and 4 drivers titles between 1974 and 1992, no other car has surpassed it in the history of the WRC. It has even won 46 of the 65 rallies it has taken part in. With its ultra-high performance, it remains a challenging car to control.

70050000013658.name: WRC 8 - Senior Staff Members Unlock
70050000013658.description: Boost the start of your career with more experienced team members for Career mode.

70050000013682.name: Party Pack
70050000013682.intro:
Expand the world of Flick Erasers!
Play new extra stages and party stages and welcome new erasers to the family!
70050000013682.description:
Get your hands on the new Party Pack!
Expand the eraser world with new stages and characters.
Play with your family or friends anytime, anywhere!

The Party Pack contains:
- 6 extra characters added to Flicky-racers
- 10 new stages added to Party Battles and Co-op
- 10 stages for Free Battle
- 10,000 bonus points

70050000013683.name: Seal the Deal
70050000013683.description:
SEAL THE DEAL introduces:

- An all-new chapter: The Arctic Cruise
- A new incredibly difficult mode: Death Wish!
- Six new Time Rifts!
- A ton of outfits, flairs, dyes and even camera filters!

Note: The Arctic Cruise requires 35 Time Pieces to access. Death Wish requires 27 Time Pieces to access.
Note: Death Wish is exceptionally, brutally difficult. Please take this into account when considering this DLC.

70050000013742.name: Trine: Ultimate Collection (Retail)
70050000013742.intro: The iconic puzzle-platforming adventure returns in its most complete iteration yet!
70050000013742.description: Unlock Trine: Enchanted Edition, Trine 2: Complete Story, and Trine 3: The Artifacts of Power to complete your Ultimate Collection!

70050000013972.name: High Res Car Textures
70050000013972.description: Download the highest quality car textures. Especially suited to TV mode.

70050000013982.name: Yapper
70050000013982.intro: The award-winning action RPG is back, bigger and better than ever!
70050000013982.description: Pre-order now and earn a pet Goblin - Yapper. Turns out he makes a pretty charming companion before his Outpost-attacking days.

70050000014050.name: Experience x3 - Asdivine Menace
70050000014050.description:
All characters' experience gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000014051.name: SP x3 - Asdivine Menace
70050000014051.description:
All characters' SP gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000014052.name: Skill Level x3 - Asdivine Menace
70050000014052.description:
All characters' skill level experience gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000014053.name: Experience, SP & Skill Level x2 - Asdivine Menace
70050000014053.description:
All characters' experience, SP, skill level experience gained increases by 100%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000014054.name: No Encounters - Asdivine Menace
70050000014054.description:
Enables the feature to configure the encounter rate.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000014055.name: Damage x2 - Asdivine Menace
70050000014055.description:
Damage dealt to enemies is doubled.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000014056.name: Full Restore - Asdivine Menace
70050000014056.description:
All characters' HP/MP/BP are fully recovered after battle.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000014221.name: Vests of Success Set
70050000014221.description: A special gift to thank you for playing the game! A pair of garments said to bring good fortune to anyone who wears them!

70050000014261.name: Wolf Wear
70050000014261.description: A special gift to thank you for playing the game! A cool costume that makes Erik look more charismatic than ever!

70050000014262.name: Baby Boar Set
70050000014262.description: A special gift to thank you for playing the game! Have some fun with one of Veronica's favourite costumes!

70050000014263.name: Trodain Set
70050000014263.description: A special gift to thank you for playing the game! Try on some traveller's togs that will show our hero in a whole new light!

70050000014264.name: Happy Adventurer Set
70050000014264.description: A special gift to thank you for playing the game! Packed full of helpful items that are sure to come in handy over the course of your adventures!

70050000014461.name: Kohaku DLC Outfit "Lolawear"
70050000014461.description:
Unlocks a new costume for Kohaku in the Base menu.
*Will not display during cut-scenes.

70050000014533.name: Arabic In-Game Commentary
70050000014533.intro: A legacy in football excellence in FIFA 20.

70050000014534.name: Polish In-Game Commentary
70050000014534.intro: A legacy in football excellence in FIFA 20.

70050000014535.name: Russian In-Game Commentary
70050000014535.intro: A legacy in football excellence in FIFA 20.

70050000014536.name: Italian In-Game Commentary
70050000014536.intro: A legacy in football excellence in FIFA 20.

70050000014537.name: Dutch In-Game Commentary
70050000014537.intro: A legacy in football excellence in FIFA 20.

70050000014538.name: Portuguese (Brazil) In-Game Commentary
70050000014538.intro: A legacy in football excellence in FIFA 20.

70050000014606.name: Ryza's Outfit "Divertimento Embrace"
70050000014606.description:
Ryza's Outfit "Divertimento Embrace" is added. By installing this content, events concerning the outfit are also added.

*Ryza's Outfit "Divertimento Embrace" might be available as free content at a later date.

70050000014608.name: Hideout Parts "Pixie Forest"
70050000014608.intro: Use the parts to make your secret hideout look like the "Pixie Forest" that appears in the game!
70050000014608.description:
"Pixie Forest" parts used for remodeling your secret hideout are added. The hideout parts will also grant unique effects.
In order to remodel, you must have progressed the game to a certain point.

(Effects)
When the time is set to night, your allies' abilities will be raised slightly.

*This product is part of the DLC set for purchasers of the "Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition".

70050000014612.name: Hideout Parts "Lakeside Hideout"
70050000014612.intro: Use the parts to make your secret hideout look like a seaside town!
70050000014612.description:
"Lakeside Hideout" parts used for remodeling your secret hideout are added. The hideout parts will also grant unique effects.
In order to remodel, you must have progressed the game to a certain point.

(Effects)
When the weather is rainy, your allies' abilities will be raised slightly.

*This product is part of the DLC set for purchasers of the "Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition".

70050000014613.name: Costume Set "Another Fashion"
70050000014613.intro:
12 varieties of costumes are added!
Have Ryza, Lent, Tao, and Klaudia try them on!
70050000014613.description:
3 alternate colored costumes are added for Ryza, Lent, Tao, and Klaudia, for a total of 12 varieties.

(Costumes)
●Ryza's costumes
 - Midnight Black
 - Blue Skies
 - Sunny Smile

●Lent's costumes
 - Gothic Wolf
 - Forest Guardian
 - Desert Squall

●Tao's costumes
 - Twilight Raconteur
 - Wonder Pastel
 - Book Fairy

●Klaudia's costumes
 - White Princess
 - Pure Maiden
 - Strawberry Parfait

*This product is part of the DLC set for purchasers of the "Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition".

70050000014614.name: Costume Set "Summer Style"
70050000014614.intro:
Summer costumes for Lent, Tao, and Klaudia!
1 costume is added for each character for a total of 3 varieties!
70050000014614.description:
1 summer costume is added for Lent, Tao, and Klaudia, for a total of 3 varieties.

●Lent's costume
 - Warrior's Day Off

●Tao's costume
 - Island Explorer

●Klaudia's costume
 - Summer Memories

*This product is part of the DLC set for purchasers of the "Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition".

70050000014615.name: Initial Dash Item Set
70050000014615.intro:
Make the earlier portions of the game easier!
Obtain 2 gathering items!
70050000014615.description:
2 types of gathering items are added that will make the earlier portions of the game easier.

(Content)
●Wind Shoes
Effect: When equipped as your gathering item, your movement speed is increased.

●Knapsack
Effect: When equipped as your gathering item, the capacity of your basket is increased.

*This product is part of the DLC set for purchasers of the "Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition".

70050000014616.name: Extra Large! Rebuild Gem Pack
70050000014616.intro: An incredible 100,000 gems essential for rebuilding items are added!
70050000014616.description:
100,000 gems that can be used for rebuilding are added.
In order to rebuild items, you must have progressed the game to a certain point.

*This product is part of the DLC set for purchasers of the "Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition".

70050000014641.name: Spirit Board Battle Set 2 - For Powerful Enemies
70050000014641.description:
This is a special offer for Nintendo Switch Online members.
You can download the following items free of charge for use in Super Smash Bros. Ultimate!

・1500 SP
・Rematch x5
・Damage 50% x5
・Weaken Minions x5
・Health Drain x5

70050000014741.name: Team Rocket Hat + Outfit
70050000014741.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Team Rocket's uniform is now available. The big R on black clothes is a sign that you're the real deal. Instead of having a Pokémon battle, though, you'll be getting your hands dirty as a Mii Brawler!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Team Rocket Hat
・ Team Rocket Outfit (for Brawlers)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000014742.name: Goemon Wig + Outfit
70050000014742.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Goemon from the Mystical Ninja series (known in Japan as Ganbare Goemon) is now available. The outfit part is for Mii Swordfighters only, and it lets you attack with Goemon's favourite pipe! Set your Mii Fighter's neutral special to Shuriken of Light to feel like you're throwing gold coins!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Goemon Wig
・ Goemon Outfit (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000014743.name: Sans Mask + Outfit
70050000014743.description:
Get ready for a skele-ton of fun! This Mii Fighter costume allows you to dress your Mii Gunner up as Sans from UNDERTALE. And if that's not enough, the included special arrangement of MEGALOVANIA will fill you with determination.

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Sans Mask
・ Sans Outfit (for Gunners)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

Music
・ MEGALOVANIA (Arrangement)
Usable after purchase by going to Vault → Sounds or by setting it in My Music.

70050000014744.name: Proto Man's Helmet + Armor
70050000014744.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Proto Man from the Mega Man series is now available. The outfit part is for Mii Gunners only, but the heroically hidden features of the solitary Proto Man might make you jump into battle whistling a familiar tune…

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Proto Man's Helmet
・ Proto Man's Armor (for Gunners)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000014745.name: Zero's Helmet + Armor
70050000014745.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Zero from the Mega Man X series is now available. The outfit part is for Mii Swordfighters only, which is a good fit for the Rank SA reploid. Take your blue Beam Saber and show your enemies the power of a Maverick Hunter!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Zero's Helmet
・ Zero's Armor (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000014861.name: Heroes
70050000014861.description: Another 30 levels with low difficulty, easy to play. Levels are set in Pixel Action Heroes theme.

70050000014862.name: Nightland
70050000014862.description: This scene contains another 30 levels with medium difficulty. They take place during the night scene.

70050000014863.name: Desert
70050000014863.description: Next 30 levels are designed for tough players, because this set of 30 levels have higher difficulty. They are set in desert environment.

70050000014864.name: Aztec
70050000014864.description:
Next 30 levels are designed for tough players and are a
bit challenging to play. Levels are designed in Aztec style
visual.

70050000014865.name: Carrotville
70050000014865.description: The hardest 30 levels are really challenging to play and are designed for skilled players. Levels are designed in homeland of the bunnies style with many carrots in background.

70050000014881.name: Coins pack 01
70050000014881.description: Use coins to get extra bunnies so you can complete hard levels. Buy 1500 coins.

70050000014882.name: Coins pack 02
70050000014882.description: Use coins to get extra bunnies so you can complete hard levels. Buy 3000 coins and get extra 360 bonus coins.

70050000014883.name: Coins pack 03
70050000014883.description: Use coins to get extra bunnies so you can complete hard levels. Buy 5000 coins and get extra 1250 bonus coins.

70050000014884.name: Coins pack 04
70050000014884.description: Use coins to get extra bunnies so you can complete hard levels. Buy 9000 coins and get extra 3150 bonus coins.

70050000014885.name: Coins pack 05
70050000014885.description: Use coins to get extra bunnies so you can complete hard levels. Buy 15000 coins and get extra 6000 bonus coins.

70050000015156.name: "Crusader" Arsenal
70050000015156.description:
An item that changes your Arsenal's exterior to look like a Crusader.

Note:
- A copy of DAEMON X MACHINA is required to use this content.
- This content is cosmetic only, and not an equipment item. Using it will not affect your status.

70050000015157.name: "Cross Scars" Outer Part (Male/Female)
70050000015157.description:
A "Cross Scars" face part for Outers.

Note:
- A copy of DAEMON X MACHINA is required to use this content.
- This content is cosmetic only, and not an equipment item. Using it will not affect your status.

70050000015158.name: "Stitches" Outer Part (Male/Female)
70050000015158.description:
A "Stitches" face part for Outers.

Note:
- A copy of DAEMON X MACHINA is required to use this content.
- This content is cosmetic only, and not an equipment item. Using it will not affect your status.

70050000015159.name: "Demonic" Outer Part (Male/Female)
70050000015159.description:
A "Demonic" face part for Outers.

Note:
- A copy of DAEMON X MACHINA is required to use this content.
- This content is cosmetic only, and not an equipment item. Using it will not affect your status.

70050000015160.name: "Robotic" Outer Part (Male/Female)
70050000015160.description:
A "Robotic" face part for Outers.

Note:
- A copy of DAEMON X MACHINA is required to use this content.
- This content is cosmetic only, and not an equipment item. Using it will not affect your status.

70050000015161.name: "Beastly" Outer Part (Male/Female)
70050000015161.description:
A "Beastly" face part for Outers.

Note:
- A copy of DAEMON X MACHINA is required to use this content.
- This content is cosmetic only, and not an equipment item. Using it will not affect your status.

70050000015162.name: "Closed Eye" Outer Part (Male/Female)
70050000015162.description:
A "Closed Eye" face part for Outers.

Note:
- A copy of DAEMON X MACHINA is required to use this content.

70070000001381.name: A.O.T. 2 Deluxe Edition
70070000001381.description:
Abandon all fear.  A.O.T. 2 is the gripping sequel to the action game based on the worldwide hit anime series "Attack on Titan." 

Experience the immense story of the anime alongside Eren and his companions, as they fight to save humanity from the threat of the deadly human devouring Titans.  Try your hand in operating the omni-directional mobility gear, maneuvering and flying through the sky to counter the Titans, and feel the thrill and satisfaction of battling giant opponents.

【Deluxe Edition Contents】
・"A.O.T. 2" Game
・20 piece additional outfit set

*Additional outfits included with this set can also be purchased separately. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

*After purchasing this content and receiving your additional outfits, you cannot cancel your purchase, regardless of whether you have downloaded the relevant items.

- This product is "Attack on Titan 2", not "Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle".
- The content of "Attack on Titan 2" is included in "Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle", which is scheduled to be released on July 5th, 2019.
- If you have already purchased "Attack on Titan 2", you can play "Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle" by purchasing the additional content "Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle Upgrade Pack", which is scheduled to be released on July 5th, 2019.
- Please visit the official site for details about the game "Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle"
http://www.koeitecmoeurope.com/aot2/finalbattle/

70070000005268.name: The Escapists 2 - Game of the Year Edition
70070000005268.intro: Take the Ultimate Prison Sandbox Anywhere!
70070000005268.description:
STOP! Yes, you there! You are under arrest on suspicion of escaping from prison! You have the right to remain silent and absolutely no right to go and enjoy The Escapists 2: Game of the Year Edition! 

Including all 11 prisons from the base game and all Escapists 2 DLC and impenetrable penitentiaries such as Wicked Ward and the Glorious Regime!  

Key Features

• Addictive prison simulation game, bursting with humour, sandbox gameplay and…duct tape?

• All of The Escapists 2 base game and DLC prisons under one roof!

• Buy, barter and beat your way to getting the items you need to aid your great escapes, with crafting, combat and any criminal activity that you think you can get away with!

• Conspire with your favourite convicts with up to 4 player co-operative and versus multiplayer!

• With the convict customisation system there’s no excuse to be a fashion criminal!

70070000006368.name: NBA 2K20 Digital Deluxe
70070000006368.description:
The NBA 2K20 Digital Deluxe Edition includes the following digital items:
• 35,000 Virtual Currency
• 10,000 MyTEAM Points
• 10 MyCAREER Skill Boosts
• MyPLAYER Clothing Capsule 
• 10 MyTEAM League Packs (delivered one a week)
• 10 MyTEAM Heat Check Packs (delivered one a week beginning at the start of the NBA season)
• 1 Sapphire MyTEAM Cover Athlete Card

70070000006369.name: NBA 2K20 Legend Edition
70070000006369.description:
The NBA 2K20 Legend Edition includes the following digital items:
• 100,000 Virtual Currency
• 50,000 MyTEAM Points
• 20 MyCAREER Skill Boosts
• MyPLAYER Clothing Capsule 
• MyPLAYER Apparel Collection 
• MyPLAYER Shoe Collection
• 20 MyTEAM League Packs (delivered one a week)
• 20 MyTEAM Heat Check Packs (delivered one a week beginning at the start of the NBA season)
• 5 MyTEAM Themed Packs (one per theme release across the next five releases)
• 2 Sapphire MyTEAM Cover Athlete Cards

70070000006421.name: A.O.T. 2: Final Battle
70070000006421.description:
"A.O.T. 2: Final Battle" contains the latest content for the tactical hunting action series based on the hit anime series "Attack on Titan."

■Includes the stories from seasons 1~3 of the anime!
In addition to the content from seasons 1~2 that aired from 2013~2018 (in Japan), the latest stories, which are planned to be aired starting in April of 2019 (in Japan), will also be included.
By joining the Scout Regiment as an original character and controlling your character in situations that occurred in the original manga, you can experience the story from the same point of view as the other characters.

■More than 40 playable characters join the battle!
In addition to Scout Regiment members such as Eren, Mikasa, Armin, and Levi, characters that played active roles in the 3rd season of the anime, such as Kenny, Zeke, Nifa, Floch, and Caven join the battle as well!

■Experience the thrilling action of "ODM Gear"!
The Omni-directional action unfolds just like the original anime.
Aim for the nape of the Titans, their weakness, as you fly through the open skies at breakneck speeds!
You can enjoy thrilling action where your movements are practically unlimited.

■New equipment "Thunder Spear" and "Anti-personnel Omni-directional Mobility Gear" have been added!
Thunder Spears are powerful weapons that can be used to get you out of even the direst situations.
They are particularly effective against enemies that are tough to cut with a blade, such as the Armored Titan!
The new equipment "Anti-personnel Omni-directional Mobility Gear" has been added!
While maintaining the thrill of omni-directional mobility from previous titles, you can enjoy all new action by shooting the enemy rather than using blades.
In addition to battling the Titans, human versus human battles also unfold!

■The new mode "Territory Recovery Mode" has been added!
A mode in which you invite your favorite characters from the original story to join your regiment, and aim to reclaim the territory beyond the walls.
You can freely set teams with combinations of characters that would be unheard of in the original story!
Increase the camaraderie among characters, and enjoy conversation events that can only be experienced in the game.

70070000006844.name: WRC 8 Deluxe Edition FIA World Rally Championship
70070000006844.description: With the Deluxe edition, you get the complete WRC 8 game, the Legendary Car pack with three iconic cars (Alpine A110, Ford Escort RS and Lancia Delta HF Integrale) and experienced crew members to add to your staff in Career mode.

70070000006861.name: The Sinking City : Deluxe Edition
70070000006861.description:
Languages supported:
Voice & Text: English, Français, Deutsch, Русский 
Text: Italiano, Español, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 日本語, 한국어, Українська, Polski, Português (Brasil), Český, Türkçe, العربية

Upgrade your experience with the Deluxe Edition which includes:

The Sinking City 
The Worshipers of the Necronomicon DLC: 3 side quests with the infamous Necronomicon and new monsters
Merciful Madness DLC: three brand new side quests exclusive to the Nintendo Switch™!

The Sinking City is an adventure and investigation game set in an open world inspired by the universe of H.P. Lovecraft, the master of Horror. The half-submerged city of Oakmont is gripped by supernatural forces. You're a private investigator, and you have to uncover the truth of what has possessed the city… and the minds of its inhabitants.

An oppressive atmosphere and story inspired by the universe of H.P. Lovecraft.
A vast open world that can be explored on foot, by boat, in a diving suit…
High replay value thanks to an open investigation system: each case can be solved in a number of ways, with different possible endings depending on your actions.
An arsenal of weapons from the 1920s with which to take on nightmarish creatures.
Manage your mental health to untangle the truth behind the madness.

70070000006870.name: Human: Fall Flat + Steam Level
70070000006870.intro: Enjoy the full Human: Fall Flat experience! In this bundle get the entire game and brand-new ‘Steam’ level DLC.
70070000006870.description:
Manipulate the steam-powered industrial environment to make your way to the exit. Play on your own or with friends with two-player local co-op or up to eight-player online multiplayer.

In Human: Fall Flat you play as Bob, the wobbly Human hero who keeps dreaming about surreal places filled with puzzles in which he’s yet to find the exit. These puzzles have multiple solutions and will challenge your creativity. Exploration and ingenuity are key and every option is welcome! 

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER MAYHEM – Fall into or create public lobbies.  Enjoy the vision of 8 clumsy Bob wobbling and falling. Discover how extra hands can bring new solutions and possibilities or just create more friendly mayhem! 

THE WOBBLY ART OF PARKOUR – Bob can walk (kind of straight), pull, push, carry, climb, break and interact with objects!  Mastering his moves will be your first amusing challenge. 

LOCAL CO-OP MODE – Play with a friend, work together to achieve any task or spend an hour throwing each other about in the craziest ways possible.

CUSTOMIZATION – Bob's wardrobe has got plenty of silly suits; from princess to dog, summer tourist, astronaut, ninja...  You can choose from the head, the upper and lower body or even change the color of it. Create your Bob your way. 

SURREAL LANDSCAPES – Explore open-ended levels which obey the rules of physics.  Interact with almost every available object in the game and go almost everywhere - like a playground of freedom.

Features: 
• Full control of Bob, no script action 
• Local solo and co-op split-screen 2 player mode
• Online Multiplayer – up to 8 players
• LAN Play feature support - play together locally!
• Open-ended fully interactive 3D levels 
• Advanced physics and innovative controls 
• Customization features from head to lower and upper body

70070000006882.name: Flick Erasers + Party Pack Combo
70070000006882.intro:
Flick! Bump! Knock off!
Play the super fun Flick Erasers, alone or with all your friends!
70070000006882.description:
Relive memories of playing with friends in school!
Flick your opponent's eraser off the desk!
Have a great time playing up with to 4 players in a variety of modes!
Play with your family or friends anytime, anywhere!

You can use more than 300 types of erasers!
You can also create your very own eraser!

Introducing the specially-priced [Flick Erasers] and [Party Pack] combo!
Enhance your experience with more characters and bonus stages!

70070000007023.name: CONTRA: ROGUE CORPS WITH SEASON PASS
70070000007023.description:
Two years after the Alien Wars ended, the Damned City erupts from the final battleground. From the midst of the chaos, a group of scoundrels emerge.

They might not be typical heroes, but they're here to save the world… or get rich trying.

Pre-order to get two T-Shirt skins for Hungry Beast. One featuring the iconic duo Bill and Lance, the other featuring the classic Contra logo. 

SEASON PASS consists of 4 DLC packs including Skins and in-game items.

70070000007082.name: Overwatch: Legendary Edition
70070000007082.intro: The Future Is Now.  Are You With Us?
70070000007082.description:
Overwatch® Legendary Edition for Nintendo Switch™ requires connection to the game servers to function. The servers are scheduled to go live at 05:00 AEDT/07:00 NZDT on Wednesday October 16th. Please be aware that Overwatch® Legendary Edition will only be playable after this time. 

Overwatch® launches globally on October 16, 2019 at 05:00 AEDT/07:00 NZDT

Overwatch: Legendary Edition includes:
•	Redeemable code for Nintendo Switch Online Individual Membership 3-month subscription (Terms apply. nintendo.com/switch-online)
•	Pre-Purchase Bonus: Noire Widowmaker Skin
•	The full game
•	5 Legendary Hero Skins
•	5 Epic Hero Skins
•	5 Origin Hero Skins

Unlock a Golden Loot Box
Purchase and log into Overwatch on Nintendo Switch by December 31, 2019 to unlock a Golden Loot Box with at least 1 guaranteed Legendary item!

Begin your Watch
Join the fight for the future in the world of Overwatch® and choose your hero from a diverse cast of soldiers, scientists, adventurers, and oddities. Bend time, defy physics, and unleash a dizzying array of extraordinary powers and weapons. Engage your enemies in iconic locations from around the globe in the ultimate team-based shooter.

Experience the Extraordinary
Speed up and slow down time. Rain destruction from above in an experimental, jet-powered armor suit. Stalk your prey as a wraith-like assassin that can appear anywhere, anytime. Unleash powers such as Dragonstrike, Transcendence, Graviton Surge, and so much more. Every hero has a unique set of devastating, game-changing abilities.

Play Heroes, Not Classes
Every hero has a unique perspective on the battlefield and a story behind how they arrived there. You are a champion of a bygone age wielding his punishing rocket hammer in the service of honor, a robotic monk committed to healing the rifts between man and machine, a genetically engineered gorilla who also happens to be a brilliant scientist, and many, many more.

Fight for the Future...Together
Teamwork is imperative for survival as you enter the fight with friends and comrades. Careful coordination will prove the difference between victory and defeat as your team combines the formidable powers at your disposal to devastating effect.

Shift Your Perspective
Just when it seems like your team is destined to go down in defeat, switch heroes on the fly and change the course of the battle. But don’t forget that your opponents can do the same. Master the game within the game as both teams shift strategies and change heroes to try to gain the upper hand.

The World Is Your Battlefield
Protect the secrets of the mysterious Temple of Anubis in Egypt, safely escort an EMP device through King’s Row in London, and do battle at many other unique locations. Every map has its own distinct feel with unique gameplay and team-based objectives.

70070000007241.name: Into the Dead 2 Bundle
70070000007241.intro: How far will you go to survive?
70070000007241.description:
This bundle includes:
Into the Dead 2
Into the Dead 2: George A. Romero’s Night of the Living Dead Add On
Into the Dead 2: Ghostbusters Add On

Journey through the zombie apocalypse in a race to save your family. Arm yourself with an arsenal of powerful weapons and do whatever it takes to survive. Maim, mow down, and massacre the Dead – anything to keep moving! In a world where no one is safe, how far will you go to make it out alive?

Features:
• 60 story levels spread across 7 chapters—each containing special challenges to complete
• 3 different endings to discover
• 8 loyal animal companions—from lovable dogs to ferocious tigers, these companions aide you in battle, level up, and come with special abilities
• 25 unique weapons across 8 classes—each with up to 7 different boosts to equip
• Side Stories—36 additional levels expand the story with unique environments, weapons, and companions
• Arcade Mode Missions—defeat the undead with each weapon and aim for high scores to unlock the next challenge
• The all-new sawblade launcher weapon and bear companion give you the maiming power to keep you moving
• HD Rumble, Joy-Con™, and Pro Controller support

70070000007282.name: BQM -BlockQuest Maker- + Samurai Era
70070000007282.intro:
Create & play your very own dungeon RPG
and share it with the world! This bundle includes "BQM" game  and  "Samurai Era".
70070000007282.description:
This bundle includes the following content.

>BQM -BlockQuest Maker
Jump into Block Quest Maker "BQM" and build your very own dungeon RPG, packed with puzzles, mazes, and traps. Secret doors, falling rocks, hordes of monsters – challenge them all and level up. Slide a box and reveal its secret, or create your own!

But wait. Isn’t designing a stage difficult?
No, not with this maker!
With simple “construct” and “connect” controls, it’s as easy as playing with blocks.
The controls are easy, but the dungeons you create can be as canny and deadly as your imagination allows. Just use your head together with BQM’s traps and gimmicks. Puzzles, action, story – which type of dungeon will you make?
Share your maze's design with players from around the world and challenge them to outwit its creator.

But do not fret my friend. If creating is not your cup of tea, you can focus only on playing dungeons made by other users.

★ “PLAY” Take on dungeons!
Let’s battle players from around the world and their pitfall-filled dungeons. All kinds of mazes are waiting for you. Use items like bombs, arrows, and magic wands to reveal every secret.

★ “CREATE” Design dungeons and earn gold!
It’s your turn to make a dungeon and embarrass other players. At your disposal is the Dungeon Editor – create an original dungeon and challenge players from around the world. Everything depends on you! Fix the entrance fee and set your eyes on becoming the most popular creator. Grow your riches!

BQM comes with plenty of built-in dungeons in Challenge Mode, as well as a newly released feature where you can share your private dungeons with nearby friends.

Share a world of your very own with players from around the globe!

>1st DLC "Samurai Era"
It comes with more than 60 Japanese themed map and event parts.

70070000007341.name: Asphalt 9: Legends Starting Racer Bundle
70070000007341.description:
Get a head start with the Asphalt 9: Legends Starting Racer Bundle! Unlock incredible supercars and resources to boost your progress, and challenge your friends and family in split-screen multiplayer right from the beginning.
This bundle contains:
• Asphalt 9: Legends game
• 20 Blueprints to unlock the BMW 3.0 CSL Hommage 
• 20 Blueprints to unlock the DS Automobiles DS E-Tense 
• 20 Blueprints to unlock the Lotus Evora Sport 410 
• 20 Blueprints to unlock the Dodge Challenger 392 HEMI Scat Pack
• 25 Blueprints to unlock the Porsche 911 Carrera GTS 
• 200,000 Credits
• 300 Tokens

70070000007521.name: Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition
70070000007521.intro: "Atelier Ryza" is about a girl and her friends on the verge of adulthood, discovering what’s most important to them.
70070000007521.description:
The concept of this title, the latest in the series to depict a new "Atelier" world, is "True-to-life youths that develop together, even if just a little bit".
It is the story of a girl and her friends who are about to become adults, discovering what is most important to them.
To depict the story of the main characters discovering things they've never seen before, we've created fields with natural shadows that allow you to feel the breath of the world. Graphics have been further enhanced, allowing for a world of daily-life and adventure to be depicted in a new way.

Main points
■Advanced "Synthesis" system & "Location Points"
The "Synthesis" system in which players combine materials to create items has been revamped.
Now, in addition to being able to understand the effects of synthesis visually, the system allows you to enjoy the experience of developing recipes more than ever before.
Also, we've included "Location Points" that players can create through synthesis!

■Use different items to gather new materials!
When "Gathering" the necessary materials for synthesis, the items you receive change depending on the tools you use to gather them, so it will be easier to obtain the items you want.

■Intense battles
With a combination of turn-based command battle and real time elements, enjoy intense battles where the choices you make determine the outcome! It is a system that will allow you to sense the feeling of strengthening bonds with your friends more than ever.

Story
The main character is Ryza, an ordinary girl.
Tired of boring village life, she escapes the village to gather with her good friends in a secret location to talk of their dreams and plan thrilling adventures.
One day, the determined Ryza and company decide to head for the forbidden "island across the shore" as their first exploration trip.
Together with the alchemist and other friends they meet there, they have a "summer adventure" that they will never forget.

70070000007602.name: DC Universe™ Online + Gotham City Starter Pack
70070000007602.intro: Your character. Our universe. Create your own Superhero or Supervillain in DC Universe Online.
70070000007602.description:
DC Universe™ Online is now on Nintendo Switch™! Join thousands of other players in this free-to-play, massively multiplayer online action game set in the popular DC universe. 
• Channel your inner hero or villain by creating a unique, customizable character with a variety of superpowers 
• Experience thrilling, fast-paced battles alongside and against DC characters including Batman, Wonder Woman, Superman, The Joker, and more
• Explore immersive, story-driven adventures in Gotham City, Metropolis, Titans Island, Themyscira, Atlantis and many other famous DC locations

THIS BUNDLE INCLUDES ONE GOTHAM CITY STARTER PACK – AN IN-GAME COLLECTION OF ITEMS THAT CONTAINS:
• Two full iconic style suits, Future Crusader and Clown Prince
• A Gotham City Emergency Signal that provides a permanent 25% experience boost to one character and will call the aid of Batman (for heroes) or the Joker (for villains)
• Twenty-five (25) Source Marks used to buy gear and other items in-game
• Ten (10) Soder Colas to regenerate health and power
• Four (4) Radar Enhancers to track special Collections throughout Gotham City and Metropolis that grant their own rewards.
 
Once you have entered the game with a character, the Starter Pack can be claimed through the Redeem/Claim section of the in-game Marketplace.  All style items are Account Bound and can only be traded to other characters on your account.

An SD Card is required to play this game.

70070000007781.name: Lightseekers Adventure Bundle
70070000007781.intro: Get tactical and play the award winning Strategy Card Game Lightseekers, with an extra Adventure and a bundle of card packs!
70070000007781.description:
Take the role of a powerful magic hero and play the multi-award winning Trading Card Game on Nintendo Switch™.

This bundle contains the base game, Lightseekers as well as the Adventure Pack; preparing you for the adventures that await in Tantos!

The world of Tantos is full of many wonders and treasures, but none more coveted than the Lightstone, which offers untold power to those who wield it. 

Now, with the Lightseekers Adventure Pack, you can venture forth into the caverns of the Steadfast Peaks to get your hands on this source of endless power. Prepare yourself with 3 booster packs and embark on a new adventure!

Lightseekers Adventure Pack Contents: 

 - Brand New Adventure Campaign
 - 3 Booster Packs, containing 1 guaranteed rare card in each!

Grab the Lightseekers Adventure Pack and prepare yourself for an adventure into the world of Tantos!

70070000007821.name: TETRIS® 99 + Big Block DLC + Nintendo Switch Online Individual Membership (12 months - 365 days)
70070000007821.description:
Includes TETRIS® 99, Big Block DLC and a 12-month Individual Membership for Nintendo Switch Online.

99 players…but only one will remain! TETRIS® 99 is the iconic puzzle game as you’ve never seen it before. Can you pick the right strategy to best 98 other players online – all at the same time?!


This game may contain advertising.

70070000008001.name: A Hat in Time - Deluxe Edition
70070000008001.intro: The Deluxe Edition contains the A Hat in Time main game and the Seal the Deal DLC.
70070000008001.description:
In A Hat in Time you play as a tiny space-travelling girl with a big tophat. Her adventure is halted when all her fuel, the Time Pieces, is lost and scattered across a nearby planet. Hat Kid must now jump, fight and stitch new hats to make her way into every nook and cranny of this new world in order to restore her fuel and resume her journey. On her way, she'll bump into the menacing Mafia of Cooks, the goofy birds of Dead Bird Studio, the spooky shadows of Subcon Forest, and more!

SEAL THE DEAL introduces:

- An all-new chapter: The Arctic Cruise
- A new incredibly difficult mode: Death Wish!
- Six new Time Rifts!
- A ton of outfits, flairs, dyes and even camera filters!

Note: The Arctic Cruise requires 35 Time Pieces to access. Death Wish requires 27 Time Pieces to access.
Note: Death Wish is exceptionally, brutally difficult. Please take this into account when considering this DLC.

70070000008481.name: Overwatch: Legendary Edition
70070000008481.intro: The Future Is Now.  Are You With Us?
70070000008481.description:
Overwatch: Legendary Edition includes:
•	Redeemable code for Nintendo Switch Online Individual Membership 3-month subscription (Terms apply. nintendo.com/switch-online)
•	The full game
•	5 Legendary Hero Skins
•	5 Epic Hero Skins
•	5 Origin Hero Skins
